resources.string: USB debugging is not enabled.\nPlease click to enable USB debugging.
USB tether is running.\nPlease open the Tether app on your computer.
Please connect your phone to your computer.
USB tether is not running.\nClick to toggle.
Are you sure you wish to turn off USB tether?
Please verify that you have an SD Card inserted and that there is sufficient storage.

The Tether for PC installation file can be found on your SD Card in the "ClockworkMod" folder.

You can share this file with your computer by enabling "USB Mass Storage" on your phone.

You can do this by swiping down the notification area.

Your USB Tether speed is limited to the speed of the slowest USB peripheral attached.\n\nIt is recommended that you attach your phone directly to your PC, away from other USB peripheral connections. Disconnect any older and unused USB peripherals that may inhibit your speed.
The Tether app on your PC is outdated. Please update it!
The Tether app on your phone is outdated. Please update it from the Android Market!
